entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
